description.zh-cn: 东汉开国皇帝，汉高祖刘邦的九世孙。他在新朝末年的乱世中起兵，经过十余年的征战，最终统一中国，开创了被称为“光武中兴”的治世。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Eastern Han dynasty, and a ninth-generation descendant of Emperor Gaozu of Han, Liu Bang. He rose up during the chaotic period at the end of the Xin dynasty and, after more than a decade of warfare, reunified China, initiating a period of prosperity known as the 'Guangwu Restoration'.

description.zh-cn: 由汉光武帝刘秀建立的中国朝代，为汉朝的延续，定都洛阳。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty established by Emperor Guangwu of Han (Liu Xiu), it was a continuation of the Han dynasty with its capital at Luoyang.

description.zh-cn: 刘秀的长兄，一同起兵反抗新朝，因功高震主而被更始帝刘玄所杀。
description.en: Liu Xiu's eldest brother, who joined him in rebelling against the Xin dynasty. He was killed by the Gengshi Emperor Liu Xuan due to his growing influence and achievements.

description.zh-cn: 西汉皇族，新朝末年被绿林军拥立为皇帝，建立更始政权。后因猜忌而杀害刘秀之兄刘𬙂。
description.en: A member of the Western Han imperial clan who was installed as emperor by the Lulin army at the end of the Xin dynasty, establishing the Gengshi regime. He later grew suspicious and had Liu Xiu's brother, Liu Yan, killed.

description.zh-cn: 新朝的建立者与唯一一位皇帝。其改革失败导致天下大乱，最终被起义军推翻。
description.en: The founder and only emperor of the Xin dynasty. His failed reforms led to widespread chaos, and he was eventually overthrown by rebel forces.

description.zh-cn: 新朝末年，刘秀率领的军队在昆阳以少胜多，击溃王莽主力军队的关键战役。
description.en: A key battle at the end of the Xin dynasty where the army led by Liu Xiu achieved a decisive victory against Wang Mang's main force despite being heavily outnumbered.

description.zh-cn: 汉光武帝刘秀统治时期，社会从新朝末年的动荡中恢复，国势昌隆的治世。
description.en: The reign of Emperor Guangwu of Han (Liu Xiu), during which society recovered from the turmoil at the end of the Xin dynasty and the state prospered.

description.zh-cn: 汉光武帝刘秀的第二任皇后，为人仁爱孝顺、恭俭。刘秀年轻时便倾心于她，曾有“娶妻当得阴丽华”的感叹。
description.en: The second empress of Emperor Guangwu of Han (Liu Xiu), known for her benevolence, filial piety, and frugality. Liu Xiu was infatuated with her in his youth, famously remarking, 'If I am to marry, it must be Yin Lihua'.

description.zh-cn: 汉光武帝刘秀的第一任皇后，后被废。
description.en: The first empress of Emperor Guangwu of Han (Liu Xiu), who was later deposed.

description.zh-cn: 汉光武帝刘秀与阴丽华所生之子，东汉第二位皇帝。
description.en: The son of Emperor Guangwu of Han (Liu Xiu) and Yin Lihua, and the second emperor of the Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 汉光武帝刘秀与郭圣通所生之子，东汉第一位太子，后被废。
description.en: The son of Emperor Guangwu of Han (Liu Xiu) and Guo Shengtong, and the first crown prince of the Eastern Han, who was later deposed.

description.zh-cn: 新朝末年的农民起义军，因以赤色染眉而得名。后击败更始政权，但最终被刘秀消灭。
description.en: A peasant rebel army during the late Xin dynasty, named for their practice of dyeing their eyebrows red. They defeated the Gengshi regime but were ultimately eliminated by Liu Xiu.

description.zh-cn: 中国古都，东汉的首都。
description.en: An ancient capital of China, serving as the capital of the Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 汉代地名，位于今湖北省枣阳市，为汉光武帝刘秀的出生地。
description.en: A place name from the Han dynasty, located in modern-day Zaoyang, Hubei province. It is the birthplace of Emperor Guangwu of Han, Liu Xiu.

description.zh-cn: 汉光武帝刘秀的父亲，曾任南顿县令。
description.en: Father of Emperor Guangwu of Han (Liu Xiu), who served as the magistrate of Nanton County.

description.zh-cn: 汉光武帝刘秀的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Emperor Guangwu of Han (Liu Xiu).

description.zh-cn: 位于古代日本九州北部的一个国家，曾向东汉朝贡并获赐金印。
description.en: A state in northern Kyushu, ancient Japan, which paid tribute to the Eastern Han dynasty and was granted a gold seal.

description.zh-cn: 从匈奴分裂出的一支部落，后归附东汉。
description.en: A tribe that split from the Xiongnu and later submitted to the Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 汉代的中枢决策机构，在东汉时期权力扩大，成为皇帝发号施令的执行机构。
description.en: A central decision-making body in the Han dynasty, whose power was expanded during the Eastern Han to become the executive agency for imperial edicts.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代最高官职的合称，通常指司徒、司马、司空。在东汉时期权力被削弱。
description.en: A collective term for the highest official positions in ancient China, usually referring to the Minister over the Masses, Minister of War, and Minister of Works. Their power was weakened during the Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝的开国皇帝，刘秀的九世祖。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Han dynasty and the ninth-generation ancestor of Liu Xiu.

description.zh-cn: 更始三年（25年）六月，刘秀于鄗城即皇帝位，改元建武，国号仍为“汉”，史称东汉。
description.en: In the sixth month of the third year of the Gengshi era (25 AD), Liu Xiu ascended the throne in Hao city, changed the era name to Jianwu, and retained the dynastic name 'Han', historically known as the Eastern Han.

description.zh-cn: 刘𬙂是刘秀的长兄。
description.en: Liu Yan was Liu Xiu's elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 更始帝刘玄因猜忌刘𬙂、刘秀兄弟功高震主，借故将刘𬙂杀死。
description.en: The Gengshi Emperor Liu Xuan, suspicious that the achievements of the Liu brothers overshadowed his own authority, had Liu Yan killed on a pretext.

position.zh-cn: 破虏大将军、武信侯、萧王
position.en: General Who Defeats the Caitiffs, Marquis of Wuxin, King of Xiao

description.zh-cn: 刘秀与兄长刘𬙂共同拥护刘玄称帝，并为其效力。后因刘玄猜忌，刘秀前往河北发展势力，最终脱离更始政权并称帝。
description.en: Liu Xiu and his brother Liu Yan supported Liu Xuan's ascension to the throne and served him. Due to Liu Xuan's suspicion, Liu Xiu went to Hebei to develop his own power base, eventually breaking away from the Gengshi regime and declaring himself emperor.

description.zh-cn: 刘秀兄弟起兵反抗王莽建立的新朝，并在昆阳之战中大败王莽主力，最终导致新朝灭亡。
description.en: The Liu brothers raised troops to rebel against the Xin dynasty established by Wang Mang and decisively defeated Wang Mang's main army at the Battle of Kunyang, ultimately leading to the fall of the Xin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 刘秀在此战中率领数千兵力，击溃了王莽方面号称四十二万的大军，为其日后建立东汉奠定了重要基础。
description.en: In this battle, Liu Xiu led a force of several thousand to defeat Wang Mang's massive army of allegedly 420,000, laying a crucial foundation for his eventual establishment of the Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 刘秀在位期间，勤于政事，释放奴婢，减少租役，兴修水利，精简官员，使社会经济得以恢复和发展。
description.en: During his reign, Liu Xiu was diligent in political affairs, freed slaves, reduced taxes and corvée, promoted water conservancy projects, and streamlined the bureaucracy, allowing the society and economy to recover and develop.

description.zh-cn: 阴丽华为刘秀的皇后。
description.en: Yin Lihua was Liu Xiu's empress.

description.zh-cn: 郭圣通为刘秀的第一任皇后，后被废黜。
description.en: Guo Shengtong was Liu Xiu's first empress and was later deposed.

description.zh-cn: 刘庄是刘秀的儿子，其母为阴丽华。
description.en: Liu Zhuang was the son of Liu Xiu, and his mother was Yin Lihua.

description.zh-cn: 刘彊是刘秀的儿子，其母为郭圣通。
description.en: Liu Qiang was the son of Liu Xiu, and his mother was Guo Shengtong.

description.zh-cn: 刘秀在统一天下的过程中，荡平了赤眉军等割据势力。
description.en: In the process of unifying the empire, Liu Xiu eliminated the Red Eyebrows and other separatist forces.

description.zh-cn: 刘秀建立东汉后，将首都定于洛阳。
description.en: After establishing the Eastern Han dynasty, Liu Xiu made Luoyang the capital.

description.zh-cn: 建武中元二年（57年），光武帝册封倭奴国，授予其“倭奴国王”金印。
description.en: In the second year of Jianwu Zhongyuan (57 AD), Emperor Guangwu enfeoffed the Kingdom of Na of Wa, granting it the gold seal of 'King of Na of Wa'.

description.zh-cn: 刘秀引南匈奴内迁入塞，安置于北方边郡。
description.en: Liu Xiu allowed the Southern Xiongnu to move inside the frontier and settled them in the northern commanderies.

description.zh-cn: 刘秀扩大尚书台的职权，使其成为皇帝发号施令的执行机构，将权力集中于皇帝一身。
description.en: Liu Xiu expanded the authority of the Shangshu Tai, making it the executive body for imperial edicts and concentrating power in the hands of the emperor.

description.zh-cn: 刘秀削弱三公权力，使三公成为虚位，将实际权力归于尚书台。
description.en: Liu Xiu weakened the power of the Three Excellencies, making them titular positions and transferring real power to the Shangshu Tai.

description.zh-cn: 刘秀是汉高祖刘邦的九世孙。
description.en: Liu Xiu was the ninth-generation descendant of Emperor Gaozu of Han, Liu Bang.
